title: How to make tasbeeh on the Fingertips? | Sheikh Assim Al Hakeem
transcript: Jew area says could you please tell me how to do this be on fingertips according to the Sunnah the Sunnah did not tell us how to do that so some people would do this on the three parts of the finger the pinky three parts of hand loss or Hanlin subhanAllah subhanAllah subhanAllah subhanAllah and some would just do it normally subhanAllah subhanAllah subhanAllah subhanAllah subhanAllah these are five and you can do whatever you feel comfortable with without any problem in sha Allah
